column1: @entity0 is a nine year old boy.  On one hot summer day, @entity0 is outside his house playingwith his dog.  He is very hot and wants to have some ice cream.  He looks in his freezerand sees that he does not have ice cream.  @entity0 then hears the song of the ice creamtruck.  @entity0 runs outside but does not see the ice cream truck.  He looks down thestreet but the ice cream truck is nowhere to be found.  The music of the truck starts toget softer and then louder.  @entity0 waits outside for an hour.  @entity0 then thinks that heneeds money when the ice cream truck comes. He runs inside and finds five dollars in hisroom.  He then hears the ice cream truck song get very loud.  He runs back outside andsees the truck pass his house.  @entity0 runs after the truck and catches up with it.@entity0 buys Four ice cream pops and some candy.  He gives his five dollars to the ice creamman and gets one dollar back.  He walks home and happily eats all of his candy and icecream.
@placeholder money does @entity0 spend one ice cream and candy
@placeholder does @entity0 want to eat when he is playing outside
